availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles H. Buford (Woodford County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, resident. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Married to Lucy A. Buford. Resident in Woodford County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, p. 449B.
Find A Grave, "Charles H. Buford (November 18, 1837-June 7, 1870)," Memorial #15496256, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15496256 (accessed April 5, 2018).
